About JLL Technologies – JLL Technologies is a specialized group within JLL. We deliver unparalleled digital advisory, implementation, and services solutions to organizations globally. We provide best-in-class technologies to bring digital ambitions to life aligning technology, people and processes. Our goal is to leverage technology to increase the value and liquidity of the world's buildings, while enhancing the productivity and the happiness of those that occupy them. Our offerings focus on the following: CRE Technology (IWMS, CMMS, and EAM), Business Intelligence, Utilization, Workplace Experience and Mobility, and Smart Buildings and Workplaces. What This Job Involves As a Senior Data Engineer at JLL Technologies, you will be directly responsible for defining the data architecture for the new EMEA Research data management product and leading a team of database engineers to develop, launch and support this product. You will also work closely with your counterpart who manages the APAC Research data management product with a long term goal of ultimately converging both products onto a common platform that runs on the Cloud. Gather, investigate, and perform analysis of business requirements from stakeholders and design suitable solutions to meet their expectations in line with the global standards. Own and deliver the data architecture by working closely with the enterprise architecture, software engineering and various platform (e.g. cloud, security, API, server, network, etc) teams. Define data engineering standards and devops processes to be adopted for the project. Lead a team of data engineers to design, develop, deploy, maintain, and improve data models and data pipelines and processes in production environment. Identify, design, and implement internal data processes improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-design for greater scalability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams across business, data management, product operations and UX design to deliver on the product roadmap and vision, Sound like the job you’re looking for? Before you apply it’s also worth knowing what we’re looking for : Knowledge, Skills And Abilities Mandatory: 7+ years of data engineering experience, and has worked on multiple, large, complex projects Advanced knowledge of data modelling concepts, relational and star schemas Advanced knowledge of SQL Server stored procedure development and performance tuning Advanced knowledge of Python (multiple inheritance, reflection, meta-programming), SQL object-oriented programming or other data related cloud technologies and design patterns Designs, architects and develops data processes, data discrepancy monitoring reports, information infrastructure and end-to-end, full-stack solutions Advanced with design patterns and can explain how to design a new application/system Advanced knowledge of Azure services (limitations and optimizations) Can design complex integrations across multiple systems Advantageous: Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Databricks, Microsoft SSIS) Experience with BI tools (e.g. Power BI, Tableau) Advanced skills in cloud technologies such as Spark Streaming, Kafka, Cosmos Db, Mongo-db, Azure event hubs, Azure Search, Graph Database, etc. Education And Experience Bachelor’s Degree (or equivalent experience) in computer science or engineering What You Can Expect From Us We succeed together—across the desk and around the globe and believe the best inspire the best, so we invest in supporting each other, learning together and celebrating our success. Our Total Rewards program reflects our commitment to helping you achieve your career ambitions, recognizing your contributions, investing in your well-being and providing competitive benefits and pay. Apply today!

job title: Big Data Engineer (Financial Services) Manager, Technology Consulting
description: At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all. We are the only professional services organization who has a separate business dedicated exclusively to the financial services marketplace. Join Financial Services (FSO) and you will work with multi-disciplinary teams from around the world to deliver a global perspective. Aligned to key industry groups including asset management, banking and capital markets, insurance and private equity, we provide integrated advisory, assurance, tax, and transaction services. The Opportunity As part of our Data and Analytics team of Financial Services Consulting practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Singapore and in the APAC region. Your Key Responsibilities Participation in large-scale client engagements. Contribution towards, or even leading, the delivery of innovative and engaging big data solutions. Understanding of business and technical requirements, provision of subject matter expertise, and implementation of big data engineering techniques. Conducting of data discovery activities, performing root cause analysis, and making recommendations for the remediation of data quality issues. Putting into practice good organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and complete multiple complex projects under tight deadlines. Skills And Attributes For Success Leverage technology to continually learn, improve service delivery and maintain our leading-edge best practices Strong presentation skills and proficiency in the use of PowerPoint, Word and Excel Good understanding of financial services industry To Qualify for the role, you must have Bachelor or Master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or other related fields. Minimally 6 years of relevant experience. Candidates with more than 9 years of relevant experience can be consider for Senior Manager position. Understanding or even practical experience of handling and manipulating semi-structured and unstructured data. Deep understanding of big data technology, concepts, tools, features, functions and benefits of different approaches available. Ability to deploy, manage, and administer Hadoop-based components. Ability to design, build, install, configure and support Hadoop-based applications. Experience with one of Java, Python, C# or C++. Experience with ETL tools such as Talend, Informatica, AWS Glue, Azure Data Factory. Hands-on experience with Talend is a plus. Hands-on experience with HiveQL. Familiarity with data ingestion tools such as Kafka, Flume and Sqoop. Knowledge of Hadoop related workflow/scheduling tools such as Oozie. Understanding of data modeling (ER models) techniques. Experience with investigating and handling data quality issues. Ideally, you’ll also have Design or implementation experience of data models in physical form in one (or more) of the leading RDBMS platforms such as SQL Server, Oracle, IBM DB2/Netezza, Teradata, etc. Experience with Business Intelligence or statistical analysis tools and techniques. Strong communication and business relationship skills to effectively explain analysis, both verbally and in writing, to others and translate analysis into a clear business plan. Strong time management and organizational skills to gather and make use of data (both internal and external). What We Look For Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritize shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. An effective communicator, you’ll be a confident team player that collaborates with people from various teams while looking to develop your career in a dynamic organization. What We Offer Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next. Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way. Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs. Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs. If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible. The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build. Apply now. EY | Building a better working world EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets. Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate. Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

We are currently seeking a skilled and experienced Market Data Operations Engineer to join our team and support market data technology products and platforms. Manage purchases including obtaining and reviewing quotations, obtain approval for purchases and submission of purchase requests and following up to ensure timely delivery and installation. Update the asset inventory in System of Records after equipment placement, decommissioning or movement. Manage regular asset inventory sighting. Review of Third-Party Colocation Vendor submitted reports for accuracy. Statistics for Data Center Activities Equipment Decommissioning Requests and Status Equipment Movement Requests and Status Equipment Placement Requests and Status

job title: Senior Data Center Customer Operations Engineer
description: Who are we? Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, operating over 250 data centers across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals. Joining our operations team means that you will be at the forefront of all we do, maintaining critical facilities infrastructure as part of a close-knit team delivering best-in-class service to our data center customers. We embrace diversity in thought and contribution and are committed to providing an equitable work environment that is foundational to our core values as a company and is vital to our success. Senior Data Center Customer Operations Engineer Job Summary A Senior Customer Operations Engineer is a skilled specialist that works on assignments requiring considerable judgement and has deep understanding of SOPs, while supporting the overall team goals. Responsibilities Queue Management / Reporting Reviews work orders in the queue and handles skilled requests which require in-depth understanding of SOPs and adherence to commitment times. Reviews expedited requests and handles or re-directs to appropriate team members. Supports cross functional teams by collaborating on customer tickets. Maintains detailed written records of all work activity. Ensures any necessary reporting is complete and accurate; executes ad-hoc reporting requests. Creates Purchase Orders (PO's) and Purchase requests (PR's). Assigns locks and keys for both Equinix and customer keys, where applicable. Supports creating reports to customers (e.g. power or access). Updates local asset databases and other systems. Installations Handles requests requiring skilled rack and stack support of customer equipment. Able to read skilled installation spreadsheet plans and supports implementing installations accordingly. Supports the building and installation of difficult and challenging installs; which may include: intra-cage fiber tray, ladder rack, customer equipment and cabinets; overhead cable trays, cage mesh, cabinets, and cable management/support systems; grounds cabinets and two-post racks; performs tape changes and back-up updates. Recognizes and raises advanced capacity concerns for infrastructure expansions needs and cabling. Performs quality checks on both cross-connects and on-site support tickets, and suggests improvements. Testing/Troubleshooting Supports skilled requests on standard layer 1, 2 and 3 cross connect certification testing. Supports the troubleshooting of skilled circuits (i.e., switched, multiplexed, etc.). Supports advanced testing and troubleshooting. Cross Connects Supports challenging datacenter cross-connect work requiring deep understanding of operating procedures for installs, terminations, modifications, and testing. Installs and tests challenging cross-connect circuits, which may include: switched, multiplexed, etc. Projects Supports advanced installations; provides input and identifies problems with drawings and assists with verification of custom projects. Supports vendors on various Data Center related projects. Performs quality assurance on new customer installation or deployments Training Supports standard operating procedures and best practices to maintain a high level of service is maintained. May coach others on operations procedures and basic safety. May provide coaching and mentorship to more junior team members. Customer Management Supports customer satisfaction through timely and precise order execution and quality assurance checks. Delivers a high level of service and an excellent customer experience when interfacing with customers. Supports sensitive customer situations. Manages time expectations on new deployments and existing alterations. Supports customers on-site by through access control and escorting services. Point of Contact (POC) for supporting skilled customer requests, exceptions or escalations. Qualifications At least 5+ years experience in data center operations preferred Equinix is committed to ensuring that our employment process is open to all individuals, including those with a disability. If you are a qualified candidate and need assistance or an accommodation, please let us know by completing this form. Equinix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and, in the U.S., an Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to unlawful consideration of race, color, religion, creed, national or ethnic origin, ancestry, place of birth, citizenship, sex, pregnancy / childbirth or related medical conditions, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic partnership status, age, veteran or military status, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, political / organizational affiliation, status as a victim or family member of a victim of crime or abuse, or any other status protected by applicable law.

A forward-thinking organization in the energy sector is seeking a Data Engineer to join their dynamic Digital Team. This organization, part of a well-established group, is embarking on a digital and data transformation journey. The team operates with the agility of a startup, rapidly implementing innovative solutions within the larger corporate structure. Role Description: The Data Engineer will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-velocity data pipelines. These pipelines are essential for decision-making and innovation across various business units. The role includes: Building and maintaining data processing pipelines in Cloud, Private Data Centre, and Hybrid ecosystems. Assembling complex data sets from diverse sources. Collaborating with other specialists like Data Scientists and Business Analysts to extract actionable insights and foresights. Developing microservices, REST APIs, and reporting services. Automating workflows and optimizing data infrastructure for scalability. Establishing expertise in large-scale distributed system design and analysis. Key Qualifications: Proven experience in building and managing large-scale data lakes and warehouses. Proficiency with Hadoop ecosystem and big data tools (Spark, Kafka). Experience with stream-processing systems, especially Spark-Streaming. Advanced skills in SQL/NoSQL databases (Hive, Hbase, Postgres). Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Java, Scala). History of working with large, disconnected datasets. Familiarity with modern development practices (Scrum, TDD, CI/CD). Preferred Skills: Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Talend Big Data, Apache Nifi). Familiarity with Hortonworks or Cloudera Data Platforms. Knowledge of Metadata Management and Data Governance tools and processes. Additional Information: This role offers the unique opportunity to be at the forefront of digital transformation in a key industry, working within a team that values innovation and agility. The successful candidate will be instrumental in shaping the data landscape of the organization, driving operational efficiency, and enabling data-driven decision-making.

job title: Backend Software Engineer, TikTok Data Ecosystem (Data Lake)
description: Responsibilities TikTok will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore and do not require TikTok's sponsorship of a visa. About TikTok TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join Us Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. Join us. About The Team The TikTok Data Ecosystem Team has the vital role of crafting and implementing a storage solution for offline data in TikTok's recommendation system, which caters to more than a billion users. Their primary objectives are to guarantee system reliability, uninterrupted service, and seamless performance. They aim to create a storage and computing infrastructure that can adapt to various data sources within the recommendation system, accommodating diverse storage needs. Their ultimate goal is to deliver efficient, affordable data storage with easy-to-use data management tools for the recommendation, search, and advertising functions. What you will be doing: 1. Design and implement an offline/real-time data architecture for large-scale recommendation systems. 2. Design and implement a flexible, scalable, stable, and high-performance storage system and computation model. 3. Troubleshoot production systems, and design and implement necessary mechanisms and tools to ensure the overall stability of production systems. 4. Build industry-leading distributed systems such as offline and online storage, batch, and stream processing frameworks, providing reliable infrastructure for massive data and large-scale business systems. Qualifications What you should have: - Bachelor's Degree or above, majoring in Computer Science, or related fields, with 1+ years of experience building scalable systems; - Proficiency in common big data processing systems like Spark/Flink at the source code level is required, with a preference for experience in customizing or extending these systems; - A deep understanding of the source code of at least one data lake technology, such as Hudi, Iceberg, or DeltaLake, is highly valuable and should be prominently showcased in your resume, especially if you have practical implementation or customisation experience; - Knowledge of HDFS principles is expected, and familiarity with columnar storage formats like Parquet/ORC is an additional advantage; - Prior experience in data warehousing modeling; - Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C++, and Scala is essential, along with strong coding skills and the ability to troubleshoot effectively; - Experience with other big data systems/frameworks like Hive, HBase, or Kudu is a plus; - A willingness to tackle challenging problems without clear solutions, a strong enthusiasm for learning new technologies, and prior experience in managing large-scale data (in the petabyte range) are all advantageous qualities. TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING We care deeply about transforming lives with AMD technology to enrich our industry, our communities, and the world. Our mission is to build great products that accelerate next-generation computing experiences - the building blocks for the data center, artificial intelligence, PCs, gaming and embedded. Underpinning our mission is the AMD culture. We push the limits of innovation to solve the world’s most important challenges. We strive for execution excellence while being direct, humble, collaborative, and inclusive of diverse perspectives. AMD together we advance_ The Role Be part of the world's most leading graphics accelerator team developing diagnostics applications for the functional and behavior verification of state-of-the-art graphics accelerators. This role will involve in designing the diagnostics architecture, crafting the verification plan, implementing the diagnostics applications, as well as analyzing and debugging the results. The Person The candidate should be a hardworking self-starter, proactive, able to share ideas, and able to provide leadership. Excellent knowledge of hardware/software integration and standard diagnostics design and development techniques. Sophisticated developer in a complex software environment. Exceptional problem-solving capabilities and data analysis skills. Excellent communication skills. Key Responsibilities The candidate would be responsible for planning, designing, developing, debugging, and optimizing functional and stress applications for machine learning and HPC hardware accelerators. Collaborate with hardware architects and logic designers to solve functional issues, and customer support engineers to help resolve verification deficiencies. Explore and adopt new or evolving diagnostics methodologies used in the industry to verify complex ASIC designs within intensive production schedules. Work within existing verification infrastructure on currently active projects. Participate in system-level verification planning. Preferred Experience Candidate should have extensive relative experience in the diagnostics environments with emphasis on ASIC system-level verification. Must have knowledge of machine learning (CNN, RNN, FNN, Transformer) and one of deep learning framework, i.e. Tensorflow, Pytorch, DirectML, etc. Must have knowledge of HPC workload, i.e DGEMM, Linpack, FFT, etc. Experience of cuDNN or ROCm development. Experience of object-oriented programming in modern C++. Strong software development skills on Linux and debug skills on hardware. Standard diagnostics design and development techniques. A proven understanding of machine learning accelerator architecture. Experience on Linux Shell. Experience on exploring and adopting new or evolving verification methodologies used in the industry to verify complex ASIC designs within aggressive, market-driven schedules. Experience with source code control systems. Knowledge of RTL design practices and tools is a plus. Academic Credentials Bachelor’s/Master’s degree, in Electrical/Computer Engineering or Computer Science Location: Singapore Benefits offered are described: AMD benefits at a glance . AMD does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services. AMD and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity, inclusive employers and will consider all applicants without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, race, religion, political and/or third-party affiliation, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates and will accommodate applicants’ needs under the respective laws throughout all stages of the recruitment and selection process.

The Company We are an innovative startup dedicated to revolutionizing the pharmaceutical processes. Driven by the power of AI, we provide cutting-edge solutions that ensure processes adheres to industry regulations and norms. If you're inspired by utilizing machine learning to streamline complex pharmaceutical processes, this is an exciting opportunity to join us! The Role We are seeking a dynamic Machine Learning Engineer to expand upon a successful proof-of-concept (POC) and launch our flagship product into the market. Your primary mission will be to architect and construct a minimum viable product (MVP) that transforms the pharmaceutical processes in a robust and scalable manner. Key Responsibilities ● Transforming the POC into an MVP: Meticulously analyze the existing POC, identify areas for improvement, and implement advanced machine learning models, refined algorithms, and user-friendly interfaces to deliver a market-ready MVP. ● LLM Integration: Leverage your expertise in working with open-source large language models (LLMs) like ChatGPT, BART, Gemini, Claude, etc., to seamlessly integrate them into our production environment, maximizing the platform's ability to understand complex medical and regulatory content. ● Restful APIs: Employ your strong Python skills and experience with API frameworks like Django or OpenAPI to build and maintain the backend infrastructure of our compliance software. ● Full-Stack Prowess: Contribute to frontend development, ensuring a seamless user experience for those interacting with the platform. ● Collaboration: Work harmoniously with domain experts in medicine, legal, and compliance to translate real-world requirements into efficient machine learning solutions. Required Skills ● Backend Virtuoso: Demonstrable proficiency in Python software development. ● API Expert: Solid experience working with Django, OpenAPI, or similar API frameworks. ● LLM Wrangler: Proven track record of integrating open-source LLMs within production environments. A bonus if you have worked with models like Falcon, open-llama, or Rhea. ● Frontend Flair: The ability to contribute to our frontend web development efforts. ● Data Management: Exhibit sound judgment when managing, processing, and preparing large medical datasets to train and fine-tune machine learning models. Knowledge of database management is a plus. ● Excellent Communication Skills: Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders alike. ● No pharmaceutical experience required. Why Join Us ● Disrupt the Industry: Be part of a pioneering team redefining pharmaceutical processes. ● Early-Stage Impact: Your contributions will have a direct and visible impact on our product's success. ● AI at the Forefront: Immerse yourself in the transformative power of artificial intelligence in a real-world context. ● Growth-Oriented Culture: We foster an environment where your talent can flourish through continuous learning and professional development. Employment Type: Contract (Part-time/Full-time)

job title: Senior Software Engineer, Data Quality Engineering, Google Geo
description: Google will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require Google's sponsorship of a visa. Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 7 years of experience in software development, and with data structures/algorithms in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++). Preferred qualifications: PhD in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field involving mathematics and statistical methods. 3 years of experience with applied data science and statistical methods, ML algorithms and tools, or applied ML(e.g., deep learning, NLP, LLM). Experience in research and development of novel methods, algorithms, or models using statistics and machine learning. Knowledge in routing algorithms. Excellent communication and cross-team collaboration skills. About the job Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.The Geo team is focused on building the most accurate, comprehensive, and useful maps for our users, through products like Maps, Earth, Street View, Google Maps Platform, and more. Every month, more than a billion people rely on Maps services to explore the world and navigate their daily lives. The Geo team also enables developers to use the power of Google Maps platforms to enhance their apps and websites. As they plot a course for the future of mapping, they are solving complex computer science problems, designing beautiful and intuitive product experiences, and improving our understanding of the real world. Responsibilities Provide measurement, analysis, and optimization of data quality. Lead generation of disruption transit alerts. Manage data infrastructure for feeds ingestion, processing speed optimization, and analysis. Identify and prevent production outages due to data. Build data experimentation frameworks and measurement capabilities. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

JOB DESCRIPTION: Role: L2 Support - COBOL Location: Singapore Experience: 4+ Years Skill Set: Unix/Linux, COBOL, DB2, VSAM, JCL Banking product Good understanding of design principles. Good exposure CI/CD process Strong debugging and troubleshooting capabilities

Description EPAM Singapore is looking for a Software Engineer (Python) to use best practices to write well-documented code for various projects including hyper-personalization and technical marketing. With your strong interpersonal skills, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams that experiment with new technology and proactively searches for the best solutions and ideas in the marketplace. What You’ll Do Solution the design and develop the software using waterfall/Agile methodology Perform investigation, troubleshoot issues by developing scripts, SQL queries Collaborate with the SOC Analysts and Infrastructure Engineers/System Owners for scope, schedules, requirements, tests, bug fixes, etc Work with deployment team/DevOps team on setting up continuous integration, build and release automation Discuss, analyse and recommend design improvements or corrections to developers throughout the development process Develop and establish quality assurance deliverables and testing framework, including create and maintain test plans and test cases in accordance with changing requirements, throughout development What You Have Degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or a related field 5 years of Python Software Development experience Proficiency in RESTful web services, API Gateway and related technology stacks Demonstrable skills in Windows, *nix, and/or Cloud development Knowledge of automated software testing methodologies such as unit testing, integration testing, functional testing, test driven development (TDD) and behaviour driven development (BDD) Ability to troubleshoot complex issues ranging from system resource, application stack traces to cloud API events Why EPAM By choosing EPAM, you're getting a job at one of the most loved workplaces according to Newsweek 2022 & 2023 Employee ideas are the main driver of our business. We have a very supportive environment where your voice matters You will be challenged while working side-by-side with the best talent globally. We work with top-notch technologies, constantly seeking new industry trends and best practices We offer a transparent career path and an individual roadmap to engineer your future & accelerate your journey At EPAM, you can find vast opportunities for self-development: online courses and libraries, mentoring programs, partial grants of certification, and experience exchange with colleagues around the world. You will learn, contribute, and grow with us Life at EPAM EPAM is a leading global provider of digital platform engineering and development services. EPAM has been expanding in Singapore since 2013 and delivering the best solutions to our customers. As a recognized leader, EPAM Singapore achieved Great Place to Work® Certification in 2023 and is committed to providing our team with inspiring careers You will have the opportunity to work with fellow talented technologists and accelerate your career by participating in our numerous upskilling, training, and certification programs. That is why EPAM Singapore was awarded Gold for Best In-House Certification Programmes in the Employee Experience Awards 2023 and Silver in the SkillsFuture Employers Awards 2022 for our efforts in championing employees' skills development and building a lifelong learning culture at the workplace. You can also look forward to developing holistically with the multiracial festivals and various wellness and cultural activities organized by our passionate colleagues here. job title: Binance Accelerator Program - Java Engineer (Big Data)
description: Binance is the leading global blockchain ecosystem and cryptocurrency infrastructure provider whose suite of financial products includes the world’s largest digital-asset exchange. Our mission is to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money. If you’re looking for a fast-paced, mission-driven organization where opportunities to learn and excel are endless, then Binance is the place for you. About Binance Accelerator Program Binance Accelerator Program is a concise 3 - 6 months program designed to have an immersive experience in the rapidly expanding Web3 space. You will be given the opportunity to experience life at Binance and understand what goes on behind the scenes of the worlds’ leading blockchain ecosystem. Alongside your job, there will also be a focus on networking and development, which will expand your professional network and build transferable skills to propel you forward in your career. You will be hired under a junior fixed term contract. Who May Apply Current students and recent graduates. Can work full-time or at least 3 days per week. Responsibilities: Participate in the data services for KYC/KYB process Responsible for the compilation and implementation of the interface documentation of the business module Demonstrate strong troubleshooting skills to solve problems provided by QA team Assist the CS team to solve customer problems and classify them for system improvement Requirements: Computer-related major, currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree Have a solid Java/python foundation and understand basic frameworks, such as multithreading and networking Familiar with Spring Microservice framework and understanding of its operation mechanism Familiar with MySQL database and common middleware such as Redis, RabbitMQ and Kafka Good logical thinking ability, strong sense of teamwork and strong learning ability Good communication skills, fluency in English Experience with open source projects is preferred Working at Binance Be a part of the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem that continues to grow and offers excellent career development opportunities Work alongside diverse, world-class talent in an environment where learning and growth opportunities are endless Tackle fast-paced, challenging and unique projects Work in a truly global organization, with international teams and a flat organizational structure Competitive salary and benefits Flexible working hours, remote-first, and casual work attire Learn more about how Binancians embody the organization’s core values , creating a unified culture that enables collaboration, excellence, and growth. Apply today to be a part of the Web3 revolution! Binance is committed to being an equal opportunity employer. We believe that having a diverse workforce is fundamental to our success. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice .

You will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining our organisation's data infrastructure and pipelines that enable our organisation to extract valuable insights. Responsibilities: Identify data from different source systems and develop ingestion, data processing and data warehouse pipeline. Supports the design, implementation and maintenance of data flow channels and data processing systems that support the collection, storage, batch and real-time processing, and analysis of information in a scalable, repeatable, and secure manner. Defining optimal solutions to data collection, processing, and warehousing. Focuses on collecting, parsing, managing, analysing, and visualising large sets of data to turn information into insights accessible through multiple platforms. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand organisation requirements then build, design and manage interpret solutions for reporting and dashboard. Ensure business rules and data definition are standardised across users and reports/dashboards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure data integration and interoperability across different systems and platforms. Review and ensure organisation’s data policy, data security standard and data governance guidelines are adhered to. Implement and monitor data security and privacy measures on existing data solutions. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of data processes, pipelines, and infrastructure. Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies related to data engineering, applying new knowledge to improve existing processes. Other duties as required. Job Requirements: Proficiency in one or more programming languages commonly used in data engineering, such as Python, Java, or Scala. Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., MsSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB). Strong understanding of SQL for querying, data manipulation, and database management. Familiarity with data warehousing concepts, dimensional modelling, and data schema design. Basic knowledge of Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) tools and frameworks. Understanding of various data formats like CSV, JSON, Avro, Parquet, etc. Basic understanding of cloud computing platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP, and their relevant data services. Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Designation and salary will commensurate with experience. We will only contact shortlisted candidates.

Short Description Job Description We are seeking a talented and motivated AI Engineer in Large Language Models (LLM) and Generative Artificial Intelligence (Gen AI) to join our dynamic team. This role offers a unique opportunity for individuals seeking a diverse workload. In this role you will find yourself developing and optimising advanced algorithms and models for natural language processing and generative AI within current and future applications . You will spearhead and implement innovative projects for document processing, content extraction and information retrieval such as sentiment analysis in student feedback, evaluations, and surveys; automate multi-label categorisation; summarise lengthy texts and articles; integrate optical character recognition (OCR) capabilities into workflows and pipelines, among others. Job Requirements Education/Experience: Bachelor, Master or PhD in STEM-related disciplines (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering), or minimally 3 years of practical experience in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or data-related role Technical Proficiency: Solid foundation in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing techniques with strong understanding of Large Language Models (LLM) and Generative Artificial Intelligence (Gen AI) Demonstrated proficiency in Python, R, SQL, and various machine learning libraries (e.g., Pandas, Polar, Retrieval, Embeddings, Transformers, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, PyTorch) and frameworks (e.g., Retrieval-Augmented Generation, LangChain) Some experience in developing and implementing Large Language Models and Generative AI solutions that includes fine-tuning LLMs for specific domains Strong understanding of statistical modeling, machine learning, and visualisation techniques Familiar with cloud technologies, cloud-based environments and infrastructure (e.g., Azure, GCP, AWS). Certification is a plus Familiar with databases for embeddings (e.g., NoSQL, VectorDB, GraphDB) Familiar with OCR technologies with a focus on PDF pre-processing, text extraction, and standardisation to ensure reliable outputs Familiar with CI/CD frameworks (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Git, Airflow) Familiar with RestAPI frameworks (e.g., Flask, FastAPI, Spring) Knowledge of Power BI is a plus Soft Skills: Ability to work independently and also be a team player. Excellent communication and collaboration skills are essential.

job title: IT Consultants (Backend Engineer, Data Engineer, Application Developer) – Training Provided
description: We are seeking for an IT Consultants for an exciting role on a very special program (Upskill Today). You will be enlisted for 6 - 8 weeks learning during which you will learn concepts like Design Thinking, Business Analysis, Effective Communication, and a full-fledged technical training program on Backend/Data Engineering/Application Development. The training needs to be undertaken full time but on work from home (WFH) basis. Following the completion of the training and a test, you will be deployed to our software development project. What Do We Offer This is a Permanent Role with Employment Benefits from Day 1 6 – 8 weeks immersive training program in (Backend / Data Engineering/Application Development) Training will be on a highly effective learning platform with mentor support and guidance Salary will be provided during training Benefits: Competitive Salary / Medical Insurance / Coaching / $ Service Awards Job Requirements And Qualification Back End Developer Proven experience as a Backend Developer or similar role with a focus on machine learning and application development. Proficient in back-end languages (e.g., Python, Java, Node.js) and frameworks (e.g., Flask, Django, Spring). Data Engineer Proven experience as a Data Engineer, Database Administrator, or similar role. Strong SQL skills and experience with MySQL or other relational databases. Advanced proficiency in Excel, including macros, pivot tables, and complex functions. Application Developer Proven experience as a Swift developer with a portfolio of released applications on the App Store. In-depth knowledge of the Swift programming language, iOS SDK, and macOS frameworks. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS/macOS applications to back-end services.

We are looking for people who are culturally curious and passionate about data storytelling. We work with famous brands including Netflix, The LEGO Group, Airbnb, PepsiCo, 2K Games,, Amazon Music, Nike, Pernod Ricard, Brown Forman and The Estee Lauder Company. Performance Program to support continuous learning, including an annual conference or language learning budget, time allocated for learning and mentorship. AIA health insurance and the extra SGD $1000 per annum for health and wellbeing. 12 weeks paid maternity leave or 4 weeks paid paternity leave. Direct message the job poster from SixSense Avni Agrawal Avni Agrawal Co-Founder at SixSense About SixSense: Founded by alumni from IIT and NIT, and funded by top investors in Asia, we at SixSense are building a no-code AI platform that allows users to effortlessly create computer vision models for image-based applications. Our primary focus is addressing the challenges faced by manufacturing companies in manually inspecting millions of images for defects. Therefore, we particularly enable manufacturing engineers to autonomously build and deploy CV models, monitor their performance, and maintain them seamlessly using our advanced software. As we compete in this fast-growing space, we at SixSense are building some of the most magical tools to change the way visual AI is created today! About the Role: We are seeking a talented Senior Data Scientist with expertise in Computer Vision to join our team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work with customers, understand their problems, and create solutions that go beyond what they expect. As a Senior Data Scientist in Computer Vision, you will play an important role in making customer projects successful through the development and implementation of advanced computer vision solutions. You will work closely with different teams to understand customer requirements, design solutions, and use deep learning to solve high-impact business problems. Responsibilities: ● Lead POCs and full-scale deployments for enterprise customers ● Collaborate with customers to understand their business objectives and translate requirements into actionable project plans. ● Design, develop, and deploy innovative computer vision solutions tailored to meet customer needs. ● Utilise machine learning techniques to analyse and interpret visual data, extracting meaningful insights and patterns. ● Evaluate and select appropriate frameworks, tools, and technologies to support model development and deployment. ● Lead end-to-end project execution, from data collection and preprocessing to model training, evaluation, and deployment. ● Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate computer vision solutions into existing systems and workflows. ● Provide technical expertise, guidance, and support to internal and external stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle. ● Stay abreast of the latest advancements in computer vision, machine learning, and related fields, applying new techniques and methodologies to solve customer challenges. ● Design AI explainability tools for monitoring and performance improvement of AI models ● Publish technical papers and present work at computer vision and Industry 4.0 conferences if required. Key skills that will help: ● Advanced degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related field ● 5+ years of experience leading AI teams and working on AI projects ● Proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects in a customer-facing role. ● Strong background in deep learning, computer vision, machine learning, MLops, cloud platforms and applied research in the field. ● Experience with deep learning research and development, especially in image classification, object detection, segmentation, Autoencoders, GANs etc ● Experience with popular AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and others ● Strong leadership and communication skills ● Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure is a plus ● Publication record in conferences such as CVPR, NIPS, ICML, ICIP, or similar is a plus. Your goals matter to us! ● We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and development. ● You will have high ownership in product development and can see the direct impact of your contribution on customers. ● Participate in discussions for creativity, expansion and scale of the product Join our team and help shape the future of AI! Perks: ● We take care of you with insurance that includes Hospital/Surgical, Major Medical, Outpatient General Practitioner & Specialist ● Annual credits for recreation, health and fitness, educational courses etc. ● Access to a huge network of technology start-ups, meetups, & conferences ● Party hard with us over board games, movie nights and weekend getaways . Know more about us: You can learn more about the everyday life at SixSense and the interesting turn of events in the life of a fast-moving startup on our LinkedIn page - https://www.linkedin.com/company/sixsense-pte-ltd/ Read more about how SixSense AI has transformed smart manufacturing in Singapore @ https://ssia.org.sg/smart-manufacturing-at-global foundries-Singapore-with-six sense/

The Group Internal Audit provides internal audit services to Singapore’s public healthcare clusters and helps improve their governance, controls and risk management. We also support the Ministry of Health in the roll-out of national schemes through compliance audits of eligibility assessment, subsidy rates and confidentiality of personal data. Job Responsibilities : Collaborate with audit teams to identify key risk areas and develop Data Science solutions for risk and anomaly detection in the continuous audit of Public Healthcare. Design and implement data-driven solutions, (e.g. advanced statistical and machine learning techniques) in order to improve the effectiveness of audit and risk monitoring for Public Healthcare. Extract, analyse and mine large data-set from various databases/data-sources to identify data patterns, trends, and risk discovery. Responsible for assisting in the planning, performing, analysis, reporting and follow-up of the Group Internal Audit department's data extraction and analysis requirements. Provide technical expertise on data analytics/science techniques and solutions Cross-train within the Data Analytics team and the Division to increase Data Science related skill sets and technical capabilities. ​ Job Requirements : Technical: BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science or related quantitative disciplines is preferred. Preferably 3-5 years (minimum) of hands-on coding experience in data analysis, data mining, and machine learning (ML). Experience in anomaly detection or graph analytics would be advantageous. Intermediate programming skills in Python and experience in data manipulation with SQL Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques, predictive modelling, and statistics, with hands-on proficiency in implementing open-source Data Science libraries and frameworks (e.g. Numpy, Pandas, Tensorflow, PyTorch, SciPy, etc.). Experience in Business Intelligence tools, such as Tableau (preferred), Power BI, etc. Nice-to-Have: Designing Data Science/ML solutions in the Cloud (e.g. AWS). Nice-to-Have: Functional understanding of data engineering frameworks (e.g. ETL, Data Pipelines, etc.) Soft Skills: Good team player who can work independently with minimum supervision. Strong communications skills in articulating technical solutions to non-technical auditors. Ability to engage business and technical experts across different levels, in order to apply data science to solve audit business problems for Public Healthcare. Believer in self-directed and continuous learning, with a passion to understand emerging trends in data and technology. Prior working experience in healthcare industry will be favourably considered.

job title: [Expression of Interest] Data Scientist - Fresh Grad
description: Who Are We? At HoYoverse, we are committed to creating immersive virtual world experiences for players around the world. In addition to game products such as Genshin Impact, Honkai Impact 3rd, Tears of Themis, and Honkai: Star Rail, HoYoverse also launched the dynamic desktop software N0va Desktop, the community product HoYoLAB, and created a variety of products such as animations, comics, music, novels, and merchandise around our original creative concept. Adhering to our mission of Tech Otakus Save the World, we have always been committed to technology research and development, exploring cutting-edge technologies, and have accumulated leading technical capabilities in cartoon rendering, artificial intelligence, cloud gaming technology, and other fields. HoYoverse is actively engaged in globalization, with offices in Singapore, Montreal, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Seoul, and other areas. When you apply to a position with HoYoverse, we will process your personal data. To learn more about how we process your data, we encourage you to review our comprehensive Global Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy. This policy provides detailed insights into how your information is collected, used, and protected throughout the application process. What You Will Do: Responsible for developing data-driven risk control solutions and algorithm modeling including but not limited to account security, payment security, and anti-bot scenarios. Apply data mining, data modeling and machine learning to extract risk patterns from raw data into meaningful insights. Monitor and analyze malicious behaviors and risk cases through comprehensive data analytics and visualisation methods. Collaborate with the operation team, business team, R&D team, and data team to design and optimize risk management. What You Will Need: Good understanding of data structures and algorithms. In-depth understanding of common machine learning techniques. Possess strong data analytics skills (with proficiency in Python and SQL). Sensitive to data, logical and rigorous, with data visualization skills. Familiar with large-scale data processing tools (Hive, Spark, Flink) is a plus. Machine learning competition experience with good results is a plus. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Fluent in English and Mandarin to liaise with teams. Note: Currently, we are in the initial stages of exploring potential candidates for this role. This is not a formal job opening and we will only reach out to you upon confirmation of the job requirement. We are an equal opportunity employer that believes diverse backgrounds are key to bringing our concepts to life. If you're looking to play a key role in creating the best immersive virtual world experience for our users, we invite you to join our team.

Job Summary: At Valoroso, a leading force in the video streaming sector, we are seeking a highly skilled and analytical Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. As a Data Scientist, you will play a crucial role in leveraging data-driven insights to drive strategic decisions, enhance user experience, and fuel our growth in the competitive streaming landscape. You will be at the forefront of analyzing complex data sets, developing predictive models, and implementing machine learning algorithms to optimize content recommendations, personalize viewer experiences, and improve operational efficiencies. Key Responsibilities: Data Analysis & Modeling: Apply advanced statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms to analyze large datasets, identifying trends, anomalies, and opportunities for improvement. Predictive Analytics: Develop and implement predictive models to forecast viewer preferences, subscription churn, and content performance, contributing to strategic planning and decision making. Recommendation Algorithms: Enhance and refine our content recommendation engine to personalize user experiences, increase viewer engagement, and maximize content consumption. A/B Testing: Design and execute A/B tests to evaluate the impact of changes in our platform, analyzing results to inform product development and content strategies. Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, engineers, and marketing teams to integrate data-driven insights into product features, marketing campaigns, and strategic initiatives. Data Visualization: Create compelling visualizations and dashboards to communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders across the organization. Research & Development: Stay abreast of the latest developments in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, exploring new technologies and methodologies to drive innovation. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field. Minimum of 3 years of experience in a data science role, preferably within the tech or entertainment industry. Proficiency in data manipulation and analysis using Python, R, SaS, or similar programming languages. Experience with machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch) and statistical modeling. Strong knowledge of SQL and preferable experience with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark). Experience in developing and deploying recommendation systems, predictive models, and conducting A/B tests. Excellent data visualization skills and experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, good with data story-telling, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across different teams and stakeholders.

Responsibilities TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join Us Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. Join us. About the team The success of TikTok's data business model hinges on the supply of a large volume of high quality labeled data that will grow exponentially as our business scales up. However, the current cost of data labeling is excessively high. The Data Solutions team is built to understand data strategically at scale for all Global Business Solution (GBS) business needs. Data Solutions Team uses quantitative and qualitative data to guide and uncover insights, turning our findings into real products to power exponential growth. Data Solutions Team responsibility includes infrastructure construction, recognition capabilities management, global labeling delivery management. We are looking for talented individuals to join us for this future position in 2024. As a graduate, you will get unparalleled opportunities for you to kickstart your career, pursue bold ideas and explore limitless growth opportunities. Co-create a future driven by your inspiration with TikTok. Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early. Responsibilities 1. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and align AI project goals with business objectives; 2. Create clear and concise documentation for technical and non-technical stakeholders, outlining AI concepts and results; 3. Demonstrate development tasks and analysis results to Product Owner and other teams effectively; 4. Able to break down sophisticated machine learning model knowledge to digestible information for non-technical audiences; 5. Develop innovative solutions and define research requirements, technical choices while ensuring scalability, maintainability, and cost-effectiveness to solve for project goals; 6. Test and evaluate different AI models and algorithms to determine their effectiveness; 7. Optimize model performance through experimentation, hyperparameter tuning, and advanced optimization methods; 8. Design and maintain AI pipelines, including data preprocessing, feature extraction, model training, and evaluation; 9. Conduct research to stay updated on the latest generative AI, machine learning, and deep learning advancements and related technologies, and incorporate new ideas and techniques into the team's work. Qualifications Essential Proficiency: 1. Coding Proficiency: Technical proficiency in Python is required; 2. Effective Communication: Demonstrated strong presentation skills suitable for both technical and non-technical audiences; 3. Analytical Thinking / Problem-Solving Proficiency: Exhibit strong problem-solving skills, capable of both independent work and collaborative teamwork. Professional / Education Background: 1. Graduates: 0-2 years of prior full-time working experience. 2. Relevant Experiences: Either: -Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Analytics, Data Science or related fields; -Previous internship experiences related to generative AI, machine learning or data science. Additional Preferences: 1. Machine Learning Knowledge: Familiarity with frameworks (PyTorch) & recent advancements in the AI / ML space (e.g. Diffusion models, LLMs); 2. Adaptability to Advancements: Proven adaptability. TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too. By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy. If you have any questions, please reach out to us at apac-earlycareers@tiktok.com

Deploys data science models and lead the end-to-end life cycle, including solution design, development, deployment, model maintenance and monitoring. Identifies meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interprets and communicates insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers. Requirements Exposure, experience and understanding of advanced analytics and modern machine learning techniques. Exposure, experience and understanding with text, image and video analysis techniques and frameworks, such as natural language processing(NLP), computer vision, object detection, image classification etc. Ability to extract data from different databases via Snowflake, SQL and other query languages and applying data cleansing, outlier identification, and missing data techniques. Exposure and experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, PowerBI etc) and techniques, able to use visual tools to communicate data findings to non-technical audience. Exposure or experience with software development skills and ability to build custom web applications using Streamlit, Flask etc. Knowledge in Python. Strong verbal and written communication skills. We are looking for a dynamic, energetic intern who is eager to solve a variety of practical deep learning and computer vision tasks arising from different businesses in GoTo Financial. Who Are We? At HoYoverse, we are committed to creating immersive virtual world experiences for players around the world. In addition to game products such as Genshin Impact, Honkai Impact 3rd, Tears of Themis, and Honkai: Star Rail, HoYoverse also launched the dynamic desktop software N0va Desktop, the community product HoYoLAB, and created a variety of products such as animations, comics, music, novels, and merchandise around our original creative concept. Adhering to our mission of Tech Otakus Save the World, we have always been committed to technology research and development, exploring cutting-edge technologies, and have accumulated leading technical capabilities in cartoon rendering, artificial intelligence, cloud gaming technology, and other fields. HoYoverse is actively engaged in globalization, with offices in Singapore, Montreal, Los Angeles, Tokyo, Seoul, and other areas. When you apply to a position with HoYoverse, we will process your personal data. To learn more about how we process your data, we encourage you to review our comprehensive Global Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy. This policy provides detailed insights into how your information is collected, used, and protected throughout the application process. What You Will Do: Responsible for risk management of global business, design and develop data-driven risk control rules and models as well as analytics applications that will convert raw data into meaningful insights by utilizing data-focused programming languages and visualization software, including but not limited to account security, payment security, and anti-bot scenarios. Apply data mining, data modeling and machine learning to extract risk patterns from raw data into meaningful information. Monitor and analyze malicious behaviors and risk cases through comprehensive data analysis and visualisation methods. Present, analyze, and communicate data discoveries, and generate interactive data reports. Collaborate with the business team, R&D team, data team, and other operations to design and optimize risk management. What We Are Looking For: Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Science/Analytics, Computer Programming and Systems Analysis or related disciplines. At least 2 years of relevant working experience in the risk control field. Proven experience in data mining and machine learning methods and their mathematical base. Possess strong data analysis skills (with proficiency in either Python or SQL) is a must. Familiar with large-scale data processing tools (Hive, Spark, Flink) is a plus. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and fluent oral Chinese to liaise with teams. Note: Currently, we are in the initial stages of exploring potential candidates for this role. This is not a formal job opening and we will only reach out to you upon confirmation of the job requirement. We are an equal opportunity employer that believes diverse backgrounds are key to bringing our concepts to life. If you're looking to play a key role in creating the best immersive virtual world experience for our users, we invite you to join our team.

Data Scientist (DS) is responsible for end-to-end ML model development, approval, deployment, monitoring and validation process that meets MAS requirements and expectations. Candidate is expected to automate and simplify machine learning (ML) workflows and deployments, as well as performance monitoring via BI tools. The role requires to work closely with business, risk, credit and IT teams as well. Responsibilities Understanding the context of problem statement and Consulting relevant business teams for clarifications where required. Data Exploration and Analysis on datasets to identify patterns, insights and anomalies. Predictive Modelling and ML development activities such as model training on historical data, feature engineering, fine-tuning of parameters and validating of performance to ensure reliable and robust results Experimentation and Evaluation – design experiments and conduct rigorous testing to evaluate the effectiveness of different models, algorithms and methodologies, as well as measure and compare performance metrics, assess impact of variable and iterate approaches to continuously improve results Collaborate with the engineering team to deploy, manage, and optimize machine learning models from sandbox into production environments, ensuring smooth integration and efficient operations Building and deploying BI solutions to creating visualizations and reports to monitor model performance Periodic model maintenance to ensure model scalability and reliability. Communication, including the documenting of discussions and relevant processes or progress in development, as well as explainability of model(s) developed. Strong analytical skills, statistical and banking knowledge, and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team. Possess good communication skills Working experience in implementing agile methodologies and practices for effective project management Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.

Description: Johnson & Johnson Innovative Medicine (JJIM), formerly Janssen, is driven by dedication to product innovation, customer focus, and organisational excellence. From research to real-life solutions, JJIM has a long track record in developing and marketing treatments that make a real difference. We are currently looking for a unique individual with exceptional analytical, communication and data problem solving skills to join the Asia Pacific Data Science Centre of Excellence, as we work on transformational data science initiatives that are innovating and changing the way JJIM operates. The Opportunity An opportunity has arisen for an extraordinary and enthusiastic Principal Data Scientist who is passionate in crafting, developing, and fielding data science solutions that drive impact for healthcare professionals, patients and for JJIM. As a member of the Asia Pacific Data Science Centre of Excellence, you will leverage your technical and communication skills to work on maintaining existing and developing new innovative data science models and algorithms. Your ability to learn quickly, demonstrate enthusiasm, bring a depth of machine learning understanding, and an appreciation for developing great products for our customers will be paramount to your success in this role. Primary focus areas include improving customer engagement and supporting our different therapeutic areas with innovative machine learning solutions. Specifically, you will: Be an individual contributor focused on developing and deploying machine learning solutions, in collaboration with the leads of the data science pillars, with particular focus on great solutions with the latest generative AI technologies. Collaborate with data scientists, our IT partners and our business partners across APAC to conceive, develop, and implement new analytics solutions to high-priority problems aligned with the regional game plan. Mentor and provide support to more junior individual contributors as appropriate. Remain at the forefront of the latest data science trends and best practices - in particular those to do with Generative AI, be able to integrate them into JJIM processes when appropriate, and be open to sharing that knowledge across the APAC Data Science CoE for collective capability building. Participate in select forums or conferences, which may require you to travel across Asia Pacific from time to time. Qualifications: Key to your success in this role will be your foundational expertise in machine learning and proven history of writing clean and efficient code for the purpose of leveraging the latest data science technologies for organizational impact. Required: Master’s/PhD in computer science, machine learning, business analytics, statistics, mathematics, bioinformatics, or related discipline. At least 6 years of experience in developing and deploying ML solutions in a variety of ML areas such as recommendation engine, semantic search, forecasting, anomaly detection, STT, TTS etc. Strong experience and knowledge of various gen-AI models and architectures, including fine-tuning open-source models, distributed training and hosting of LLM and LLM Ops. Solid understanding of foundational machine learning concepts and algorithms. Experience working with good DevOps practices, familiarity with CI/CD tools and infrastructure as code (Docker/Kubernetes/etc.). Expert knowledge of Python and SQL programming. Preferred: Strong contribution to open-source projects. Thought leadership in AI/ML. Experience in any cloud-based stack (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP). An interest in innovating in the pharmaceutical industry. Personal Qualities Proven ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, being able to distil your tasks in a digestible form for your colleagues and stakeholders alike.

About SATS – Feed And Connect Communities SATS is a global leader in gateway services and Asia's pre-eminent provider of food solutions. Using innovative food technologies and resilient supply chains, we create tasty, quality food in sustainable ways for airlines, foodservice chains, retailers, and institutions. With heartfelt service and advanced technology, we connect people, businesses, and communities seamlessly through our comprehensive gateway services for customers such as airlines, cruise lines, freight forwarders, postal services and eCommerce companies. Fulfilling our purpose to feed and connect communities, SATS delights customers in over 210 locations and 27 countries across the Asia Pacific, UK, Europe, the Middle East and the Americas. SATS has been listed on the Singapore Exchange since May 2000. For more information, please visit www.sats.com.sg. Key Responsibilities You will be part of SATS Data Science team responsible for leading the team's operations in providing Analytics, Business Intelligence and AI/ML solutions to SATS business units. You will work with data scientists, AI/ML engineers, data engineers and other key stakeholders. This position is based in Singapore. ML/AI Subject Matter Expert for teams of data scientists, data engineers and other key stakeholders in a fast-paced cross-functional and diverse environment Spearhead the development and execution of an AI/data governance framework, with a focus on ensuring that AI technologies are well researched and developed. Strategize the design and deployment of ML models using high-end tools and technologies. Manage cross-functional teams to develop, deploy and maintain CI/CD pipelines and ML systems to standardize and streamline the continuous delivery of high-performing models in production. Stay current on new products and relevant industry trends in the field of ML Engage senior managements with insights and outcomes to improve and enhance business processes and performances Key Requirements Technical Skills: Degree holder in Information Systems, Data Analytics, Data Science, Information Technology or Computer Science with at least 8 years in AI/ML and data analytics Proficient in Python, R, and other common ML languages and libraries such as Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras and PyTorch Proficient in the design and implementation data science and machine learning on cloud-based platforms, such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Platform Experience in working with cross-functional teams of data engineers, data analysts and data scientists using data cloud platform, such as Data Lakehouse with Databricks, Snowflake Soft Skills Experience in engaging with senior management in enterprise data related strategies and policies. Highly motivated, structured and methodical with high degree of initiative Strong problem solving, quantitative and analytical abilities. Excellent written and oral communication skills Able to work independently or cross functionally.

Whether it’s living out our core values or making a difference in our communities, we’re here to make sure you grab life with both hands. We make an impact by developing the state-of-the-art Deep Learning models to create better user experiences. Our team is made up of enthusiastic Data Scientists with various backgrounds. Here are some of the global benefits we offer: Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to marginalised communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Your well-being is our priority.
